CS 164/266 - Computational Geometry Homework 4, 50 Points
Due: Friday, February 16, 11:55pm

Assignments must be turned in using the EEE system.

From the de Berg et al. Computational Geometry textbook:

  1. 10 points. Problem 4.14
  2. 10 points. Problem 4.16
  3. 10 points. Problem 5.3
  4. 10 points. Problem 5.10
  5. 10 points. Problem 5.11
